name: Amber
title: Champion Glider
description: Amber is an Outrider of the Knights of Favonius. In an age where Outriders are becoming obsolete, she continues on with her responsibilities. It takes a newcomer only a few days to feel right at home with this passionate girl.

normalattack.name: Sharpshooter
normalattack.description: Shoot up to five consecutive shots with a bow and arrow. When charged, it can perform a precise Aimed Shot that inflicts Pyro DMG.

elementalskill.name: Explosive Puppet
elementalskill.description: Taunts enemies drawing them towards itself before exploding and inflicting Pyro DMG.

elementalburst.name: Fiery Rain
elementalburst.description: A shower of arrows rains down on your enemies and inflicts Pyro DMG.

passivetalent1.name: Gliding Champion
passivetalent1.description: The party's gliding stamina consumption is reduced by 20%.

passivetalent2.name: Precise Shot
passivetalent2.description: When Aimed Shot hit on weak spots her Base ATK increases by 15% for 10s.

passivetalent3.name: Every Arrow Finds Its Target
passivetalent3.description: Increases the CRIT Rate of Fiery Rain by 10%, and AoE by 30%.

constellations.c1: One Arrow to Rule Them All
constellations.d1: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.
constellations.d2:
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it. 
 Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Fiery Rain by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d4: Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.
constellations.d5:
Increase the Level of Explosive Puppet by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d6: Fiery Rain increases Amber's Movement SPD by 15% and Base ATK by 15% for 10s.

profile.description:
A perky, straightforward girl, who is also the only Outrider of the Knights of Fayonius.
Her amazing mastery of the glider has made her a three-time winner of the Gliding Champion in Mondstadt.
As a rising star within the Knights of Favonius, Amber is always ready for any challenging tasks.

zhdescription: 永远充满活力的女孩，骑士团最优秀，同时也是最后的侦察骑士。
zhtitle: 西风骑士团侦察骑士、飞行冠军

zhnormalattack.name: 神射手
zhnormalattack.description:
普通攻击 进行至多五段的连续射击。

 重击
进行伤害更高、更为精准的瞄准射击。瞄准时，烈焰会在箭矢上持续积聚。聚满了烈焰的箭矢会造火元素伤害

zhelementalskill.name: 爆弹玩偶
zhelementalskill.description: 请可靠的兔兔伯爵上阵。 持续嘲讽周围的敌人，吸引火力; 耐久度按比例继承安柏的生命值上限; 被摧毁或持续时间结束时，会发生剧烈的爆炸,造成火元素范围伤害。

zhelementalburst.name: 箭雨
zhelementalburst.description: 射出火焰箭雨，持续造成火元素范围伤害。

zhpassivetalent1.name: 百发百中！
zhpassivetalent1.description: 箭雨的暴击率提高10%，影响范围扩大30%。

zhpassivetalent2.name: 压制射击
zhpassivetalent2.description: 瞄准射击命中弱点时，基础攻击力提高15%，持续10秒。

zhpassivetalent3.name: 飞行冠军
zhpassivetalent3.description: 队伍中所有角色滑翔消耗的体力降低20%。

zhconstellations.d1: 瞄准射击时，会连续射出2支箭。第二支箭能造成原本20％的伤害。
zhconstellations.d2: 兔兔伯爵进行了全新改良！满蓄力瞄准射击命中兔兔伯爵脚部时，能直接引爆兔兔伯爵。通过这种方式主动引爆兔兔伯爵时，会额外造成200％伤害
zhconstellations.d3: 箭兩的技能等级提高3级。（最高提升至15级）
zhconstellations.d4: 爆弹玩偶的冷却时间减少20%,并增加1次可使用次数。
zhconstellations.d5: 爆弹玩偶的技能等级提高3级。（最高提升至15级）
zhconstellations.d6: 使用箭雨后的10秒内，队伍中所有角色的移动速度提升15%,基础攻击力提升15%。
